evaluation.description: This step focuses on establishing a comprehensive OH&S monitoring and measurement process to continuously monitor, manage, and communicate safety risks. Users will be guided through creating a detailed plan for implementing this process based on ISO 45001 standards.

tasks.name: Complete OH&S Monitoring and Measurement Process
tasks.description: GPT will provide users the 'to-do-list' based on standard ISO 45001. Then GPT guides users through the lists and asks the user to fill in the details.

completeness.description: Address briefly all items in the provided to-do list
Provide detailed information for each subtask

quality.description: No strict guidelines are provided. But the more detailed the information, the better.
Suggest further improvements and other aspects to consider

presentation.description: Organize information in a logical, easy-to-follow manner

subtasks: Identify legal and other requirements to be fulfilled
List activities and operations related to identified hazards, risks, and opportunities
Define progress indicators for OH&S objectives
Specify operational and other controls to be evaluated for effectiveness

to_do_list.task: Establish methods for monitoring, measurement, analysis, and performance evaluation
subtasks: Select appropriate methods ensuring valid results
Document chosen methods and their rationale
Ensure criteria align with organizational goals and industry standards
Create a timeline for regular monitoring activities
Set specific dates or intervals for measurements

to_do_list.task: Plan analysis, evaluation, and communication of results
subtasks: Establish a process for analyzing monitoring and measurement data
Define how and when to evaluate the analyzed data
Create a communication plan for sharing results with relevant stakeholders

to_do_list.task: Implement the monitoring and measurement process
subtasks: Train relevant personnel on the new process
Begin data collection according to the established schedule
Regularly review and adjust the process as needed
